Angel Cat:
Here the list of awards which you can receive having taken part in it эвенте. Why to you not to test good luck?
Having collected a word L I N E A G E II you can receive: Ring of Baium. Vesper Weapon (random). Soul Crystal 14-16 levels. Blessed Scroll of Resurrection (2 count). Blessed Scroll of Escape (2 count). Greater Quick Healing Potion (5 count).
Having collected a word N C S O F T you can receive: Ring of Queen Ant. Vesper Armor (random). Кристалл element (random). Blessed Scroll of Resurrection (2 count). Blessed Scroll of Escape (2 count). Greater Quick Healing Potion (5 count).
